meanings.sent1: I saw many medusas swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium had a tank full of colorful medusas.
meanings.sent3: The medusas seemed to be having a party in the water.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a tangle of medusas after a windy day at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The medusas glowed like underwater lanterns, lighting up the dark sea.

meanings.definition: Medusas: a type of jellyfish with a bell-shaped body and tentacles
meanings.sent1: The medusas gracefully floated in the water, their tentacles trailing behind.
meanings.sent2: Swimmers were cautious of the medusas in the sea.
meanings.sent3: The medusas looked like delicate dancers twirling in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent4: The medusas' tentacles reached out like ghostly fingers in the water.
meanings.sent5: The medusas pulsated with a mesmerizing glow, captivating all who saw them.

meanings.definition: Medusas: a mythical creature with snakes for hair, known as Gorgon
meanings.sent1: In the ancient tales, heroes faced fierce medusas with deadly gazes.
meanings.sent2: The medusas in the story turned anyone who looked at them into stone.
meanings.sent3: The medusas' hair of snakes made them the envy of all other mythical creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her stare was as chilling as that of the legendary medusas.
meanings.sent5: The medusas' hissing snakes added an eerie touch to their already fearsome appearance.
